about_the_game:
Super Kickers League :Vikings & Valkyries! brings nordic and elemental powers new content to Super Kickers League!
Use all of the new content in every game modes!

Features:
  • 2 new teams with elemental powers : The vikings from Northern Fury, and the valkyries from Divine Storm !
  • 1 new map : Northern Park, where drakkars can be seen while playing football!
  • 2 new music tracks

TEAM VIKINGS : Northern Fury, lead by Sigurd Nord.

The power of Sigurd? He has the power of Odin.
Odin's Fist can throw a lightning ball right that stun the opponent!

TEAM VALKYRIES : Divine Storm, lead by Helga Kaase

The power of Helga ? THUNNNNDEEEER!
The Divine Intervention throw storms all around Helga, stunning all ennemies around her.

Northern Park

Discover a brand NEW map ! Available by day or night, you can see big portals, statues and even a big DRAKKAR in the back !

Two new songs!

Northern Park (Day) and Northern Park (Night) got their own music. Enjoy the new beats!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or better
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Super Kickers League : Vikings & Valkyries! brings nordics theme and elemental powers to Super Kickers League! Get two new teams with their own captains and abilities, as well as one new map (playable by day or by night) and new music !
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
